name: Castle Rush
description:
Castle Rush A 1v1 local pick'up game!  Pitch 

You are a lord and your castle's pieces really want to duke it out with their rivals from across the field! You have to stop them if you don't want to have a war on your hands.

Grab them with your all-mighty hand and bring them back to your base.  

Controls

Xbox360 controller required : 

  • Left Joystick: Move your hand
  • A Button: Grab a castle piece 
Team

Extraordinary game created with a fabulous team in 48h :

  • Alexandre Cornudet: Pixel artist (https://www.facebook.com/cornulab/)
  • Hélène Boudier: 2D animator (https://heleneboudier.tumblr.com/)
  • Clément Rondeau: Programmer
    (http://www.rondeau-clement.fr/)
  • Antoine Chabroux-Wert: Sound designer
  • Eva Abollivier: Game designer
  • Paul Gaston: Game designer
  • Guillaume Voisinet: UX designer / Project manager

This game was made with Unity and Aseprite :)

Special thanks

Thanks to Enjmin's BDE who handled this GameJam! 

Try it now and leave us a comment! ;)
